p: IgM and IgG antibodies against SARS-CoV-2 in the plasma samples were tested using the Diagnostic Kit for Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCOV, SARS-CoV-2) IgM/IgG Antibody (Magnetic particle CLIA) supplied by Bioscience (ChongQing, China) Diagnostic Technology Co. according to the manufacturerâ€™s instructions.
